unit.utterance: Dai ni gaw 2017 ning January shata 15 ya rai nga ai.
unit.utterance_translation: Today is 15th January, 2017.

unit.utterance: Ya ngai hkai dan na maumwi gaw gaida gasha a lam ngu ai rai nga ai.
unit.utterance_translation: The story I will tell (you) now is what (we) call "A story of a widow's son."

unit.utterance: Moi kalang mi na hta mare langai mi kaw i
unit.utterance_translation: Long ago, once upon a time, in a village, OK?

unit.utterance: grai matsan ai gaida hkan nu lahkawng nga ai.
unit.utterance_translation: lived a widow and her son who were very poor.

unit.utterance: Ganu gaw grai matsan let sha grai gasha hpe bau maka ai.
unit.utterance_translation: Being very poor, the mother took care of her son very much.

unit.utterance: Lani mi na aten hta shanhte mare kaw na ni gaw i
unit.utterance_translation: One day, they, the villagers, OK?

unit.utterance: ah nga nawng htawk poi nga nawng htawk ai dai nhtoi ngu ai dai nhtoi galaw ya ai.
unit.utterance_translation: well, held a scooping-up-pond-festival, the day they scooped up a fish pond.

unit.utterance: Mare ting nga nawng jawm htawk ai nhtoi lamang langai galaw ya ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: (They) held a festival program where the whole villagers removed water from a pond (to catch fish), it's said.

unit.utterance: Dai shaloi mare ting mai sa ai.
unit.utterance_translation: That time, the whole village could go (to the festival).

unit.utterance: Gadai tim mai sa ai
unit.utterance_translation: Anyone could go (there).

unit.utterance: Dai shaloi sa ai shaloi
unit.utterance_translation: That time, (the villagers) went and

unit.utterance: gaida gasha hkan nu mung sa ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: the widow and her son also went, it's said.

unit.utterance: Dai shaloi gaida gasha gaw shi gaw shabrang la re majaw gaw i
unit.utterance_translation: That time, the widow's son, because he was a youth, OK?

unit.utterance: nga kaba ni grai law hkra lu rim ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: could catch many big fish, it's said.

unit.utterance: Dai shaloi gaga lu su ai ni mung sa ai.
unit.utterance_translation: That time, other rich people also went (there).

unit.utterance: yawng mare ting sa ai re majaw
unit.utterance_translation: Because all, all of the villagers went...
unit.add_comments: In Jinghpaw, inanimate nouns cannot be used as actors, so the translation has to be 'all of the villagers' rather than 'the whole village'.

unit.utterance: raitim shi ganu hpe bai yu dat ai shaloi
unit.utterance_translation: But when he (the widow's son) looked at his mother,

unit.utterance: Ganu gaw aw matsan shayen di na
unit.utterance_translation: his mother was very poor and

unit.utterance: shingnoi shaje hte sha rai di
unit.utterance_translation: (she) was with a torn basket and

unit.utterance: hka hkingau hkan nga ai nga kaba ni nlu rim ai majaw
unit.utterance_translation: and because (she) could not catch big fish near the shore,

unit.utterance: nga kaba ni nlu rim ai majaw
unit.utterance_translation: because (she) could not catch big fish

unit.utterance: nga kachyi chyi sha law ni hpe sha hkan rim hkawm taw ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: she was walking, catching only small fish, it's said.

unit.utterance: Dai shaloi gaida gasha gaw ganu hpe shi lu rim da ai nga gaba bang ya na ngu myit dat ai shaloi
unit.utterance_translation: That time, when the widow's son intended to put big fish he could catch (into her basket) for his mother,

unit.utterance: ganu hpe bai yu dat ai shaloi wa
unit.utterance_translation: when (he) looked at his mother again,

unit.utterance: dai shani sa ai ganu ni hta na shi ganu gaw ntsawm dik htum rai taw ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: his mother was the least beautiful among mothers who went (to the festival) on that day, it's said.

unit.utterance: dai majaw shi gaw grai nkam bang ya ai.
unit.utterance_translation: So, he did not want to put (fish into her basket for her).

unit.utterance: Dai shi nu re hpe masha ni chye mat na mung shi nra ai.
unit.utterance_translation: He did not like people knowing that she was his mother.

unit.utterance: Dai hku grai nna nkam bang ya ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: Like that, he did not want to put (fish into her basket for her) very much, it's said.

unit.utterance: dai majaw shi gaw sahte num ni tsawm tsawm re num ni kaga ganu tsawm tsawm re ni na shingnoi kaw shi lu rim ai nga kaba ni bang ya ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: So, he put the big fish he could catch into baskets of rich women, beautiful women, and other beautiful mothers, it's said.

unit.utterance: Dai di na shana de mung jan du mat rai di na
unit.utterance_translation: Then, at night the sun set and

unit.utterance: shi mung nta bai wa di na
unit.utterance_translation: he went home again and

unit.utterance: ganu ma hpa ntsun ai.
unit.utterance_translation: his mother said nothing (to him).

unit.utterance: Hpa majaw nga yang shi gasha hpe grai tsaw ra ai.
unit.utterance_translation: That was because she loved her son very much.

unit.utterance: Dai gasha shingtai langai sha re majaw
unit.utterance_translation: That was because that was her only son.

unit.utterance: dai di na gasha gaw shana de hka shin la di na she
unit.utterance_translation: Then, at night, the son bathed and

unit.utterance: shani shi nga rim bang da ya ai nta ni hkan shi gaw sa ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: he went to houses where those who he put fish during the day lived, it's said.

unit.utterance: Dai jaw sha na kun nga myit di na sa ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: (He) went (there), thinking whether (they) fed (foods to him), it's said.

unit.utterance: sa di na
unit.utterance_translation: (He) went and

unit.utterance: sa yang
unit.utterance_translation: when (he) went

unit.utterance: dai dai ni gaw shi hpe hpa nga mung n hkap jaw sha ai.
unit.utterance_translation: they fed him no fish.

unit.utterance: Chyinghka ni mung hkap pat kau ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: (They) closed their doors too, it's said.

unit.utterance: Shi grai kaw si mat ai i.
unit.utterance_translation: He became very hungry, didn't he?

unit.utterance: Grai kawsi hpang gara hkrum mat ai.
unit.utterance_translation: (He) got very hungry and thirsty.

unit.utterance: Dai shaloi shi grai myit n pyaw di
unit.utterance_translation: That time, he was very unhappy and

unit.utterance: shi nta de wa ai.
unit.utterance_translation: he went back home.

unit.utterance: Rai tim shi nta n gwi shang ai
unit.utterance_translation: But, he did not dare to enter his house.

unit.utterance: Ganu hpe hkrit ai.
unit.utterance_translation: (He) was afraid of his mother.

unit.utterance: Hpa majaw nga yang shi shani ganu hpe hpa nbang ya ai majaw.
unit.utterance_translation: This is because he put nothing (into her basket) for his mother during the day.

unit.utterance: Dai yang she ganu gaw shi hpe mu ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: Then, his mother found him, it's said.

unit.utterance: Dai shaloi ganu gaw
unit.utterance_translation: That time, his mother (said)

unit.utterance: Nu sha e hpa di na gara de wa wam hkawm ai ta?
unit.utterance_translation: "My son, why and where did (you) go around?"

unit.utterance: Anu nang hpe dai ni anu hkwi wa ai nga kachyi sha hte ah nu nang hpe shat rau jawm sha na matu shadu da ai le.
unit.utterance_translation: "I have cooked (dinner) for you with small fish I fished today to eat together."

unit.utterance: shat rau sha na matu la taw ai le ngu di na
unit.utterance_translation: "(I) am waiting (for you) to eat dinner together", she said, and

unit.utterance: gasha hpe hkap tsun ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: (she) said to his son, it's said.

unit.utterance: Dai shaloi shi grai myit n pyaw mat ai i.
unit.utterance_translation: That time, he feel very sorry, didn't he?

unit.utterance: Grai myit malai lu mat ai.
unit.utterance_translation: (He) changed his mind.

unit.utterance: Hpa majaw ta nga yang
unit.utterance_translation: This is because

unit.utterance: ganu gaw shi gaw ganu hpe hpa nga nrim bang ya timung
unit.utterance_translation: although he caught and put nothing (into her basket) for his mother,

unit.utterance: ganu gaw shi hpe kachyi chyi sha law ai nga sha tsawm ri sha lu rim la ai shadu da na
unit.utterance_translation: his mother cooked what were small fish (she) caught with difficulty for him and

unit.utterance: shi hpe la taw ai.
unit.utterance_translation: (she) was waiting for him.

unit.utterance: Ganu a tsawra myit i.
unit.utterance_translation: (It) is mother's love, isn't it?

unit.utterance: Hpa hte mung galai nlu ai.
unit.utterance_translation: We can replace it with nothing.

unit.utterance: Ganu shi hpe mungkan ntsa shi hpe tsawra dik gaw ganu sha rai taw nga ai.
unit.utterance_translation: Who loves him most in the world is only his mother.

unit.utterance: Dai majaw shi dai shani kaw na ganu a chyeju hpe ganu a tsawra myit hpe grai chye na mat di
unit.utterance_translation: So, from that day he understood his mother's favour, his mother's love very much and

unit.utterance: shan nu lahkawng shat rau sha di
unit.utterance_translation: the two, mother and her son, ate dinner together and

unit.utterance: shi ganu hpe grai tawng ban ai i.
unit.utterance_translation: he apologized to his mother very much, OK?

unit.utterance: Dai hte maren sha anhte mung un.. ganu ngu gaw ganu sha re i.
unit.utterance_translation: Likewise, we, well, mother is only mother, OK?

unit.utterance: Ganu a chyeju hpe gaw hpa hte ma galai nlu ai.
unit.utterance_translation: We can replace the mother's favor with nothing.

unit.utterance: Ganu gaw malai n nga ai ganu re ngu ai gaw
unit.utterance_translation: What we say "Mother is a mother with no substitute"

unit.utterance: dai gaida jan hkan nu a maumwi hpe yu let
unit.utterance_translation: looking at the story of that widow and her son,

unit.utterance: hpaji la mai nga ai law.
unit.utterance_translation: (we) can learn (it).

unit.utterance: Grai chyeju kaba sai.
unit.utterance_translation: Thank you very much.
